Math.text: (cosine@(theta) + i * sine@(theta)) ^ n = (sum _ (0 less= nu less= n))@(i ^ nu * binomial@(n, nu) * (cosine ^ (n - nu))@(theta) * (sine ^ nu)@(theta))
(cosine@(theta) + i * sine@(theta)) ^ n

+ i * (sum _ (0 less= 2 * k + 1 less= n))@((- 1) ^ k * binomial@(n, 2 * k + 1) * (cosine ^ (n - 2 * k - 1))@(theta) * (sine ^ (2 * k + 1))@(theta))
+ i * (sum _ (0 less= 2 * k + 1 less= n))@((- 1) ^ k * binomial@(n, 2 * k + 1) * (cosine ^ (n - 2 * k - 1))@(theta) * (sine ^ (2 * k + 1))@(theta))
(cosine@(theta) + i * sine@(theta)) ^ n = e ^ (i * theta) ^ n = e ^ (i * n * theta) = cosine@(n * theta) + i * sine@(n * theta)

cosine@(n * theta)

absent = (sum _ (0 less= k less= n / 2))@(binomial@(n, 2 * k) * (cosine ^ (n - 2 * k))@(theta) * ((cosine ^ 2)@(theta) - 1) ^ k)
